page.title: 04Elford School
page.content: The education in our village is of a very high standard.There are three teachers and one secetary who are all very kind people.We are taught to play different musical instruments such as the violin,the recorder and the cello and we are taught different songs.When we do concerts Mrs.Bates arranges for us to go and entertain the old people. They always enjoy it.We visit Tamworth baths every Wednesday,for lessons.Once a year all the schools compete against each other in a swimming gala.For the past four years our school has won. Every week we do English,Maths and scientific work.After our fantastic education at Elford school we can either Lichfield or Tamworth school.We also go on educational trips that are always exciting.
